content.prompt: Chinaâ€™s rapid industrialization over the past 30 years has done which of the following?

choices.label: Narrowed the gap between the rich and the poor
Decreased the authority of the Standing Committee of the Politburo
Limited the flow of migrant workers to urban areas
Increased the types of social welfare benefits citizens receive

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.7: Impact of Industrialization and Economic Development

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
